name: StarCraft2companion
0:
”Alexa ask star craft get ghost description”
”Alexa ask star craft how to counter Thor playing Zerg”
”Alexa ask star craft Mutalisk tactics against Protoss”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: star craft
des:
StarCraft 2 companion will get you brief unit description, unit strengths and weaknesses as well as many other useful information.
I'll create website with all possible invocations. Please give me some feedback about this skill.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
